entry.value: SELECT NOMSUC, RAMO, POLIZA, CERTIF, NOMCLI, NITC, FECTER, CAST(PRIMA+IVA+GASTOS AS VARCHAR2(100)) AS SUMAPRIMAIVAGASTOS1, CAST(PRIMA+IVA+GASTOS AS VARCHAR2(100)) AS SUMAPRIMAIVAGASTOS2 FROM CONFIANZA.DET_SALDOS WHERE NITAGE =:CODEFIND AND FECHACORTE = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(SYSDATE)), 'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'DD/MM/YYYY')
